content:
# The movement command executed successfully, and I am now at a position that should allow me to place the stone furnace.

# I will attempt to place the stone furnace again at a closer position.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Direction.UP, Position(-6, 5))  # Place the stone furnace at the new position.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities after placing the furnace.
